docs.title: Olly.gg
docs.text:
This site is mostly a collection of personal notes, things I’ve learned, things I’m exploring, and things I don’t want to forget.

I’m sharing them in case they help someone else who’s on a similar path. No promises of correctness, completeness, or polish though, be warned.

docs.title: Environment Setup
docs.text: Notes on Hypervisors and VMs: Proxmox, VirtualBox, Windows v Linux etc.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: This section will introduce malware analysis fundamentals.
